required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety,Tolerability, Pharmacokinetic,Pharmacodynamics and Efficacy of KY100001 in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase Ⅰ Clinical Study of Single-arm, Open, Single/Multiple Dose Escalation and Dose Extension to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetic, Pharmacodynamics and Efficacy of KY100001 in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: to assess the safety,tolerability, pharmacokinetic,pharmacodynamics and efficacy of KY100001 in patients with advanced solid tumors

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Single-arm, open, single/multiple dose escalation (100mg/d, 200mg/d, 350mg/d, 550mg/d, 750mg/d) and dose Extension

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal vital signs
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of KY100001 in subjects with advanced solid cancer in terms of abnormal vital signs

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal physical examination
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of KY100001 in subjects with advanced solid cancer in terms of abnormal physical examination

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal laboratory examination
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of KY100001 in subjects with advanced solid cancer in terms of abnormal laboratory examination

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal electrocardiogram
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of KY100001 in subjects with advanced solid cancer in terms of abnormal electrocardiogram

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in ECOG score
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of KY100001 in subjects with advanced solid cancer in terms of ECOG score

secondary_outcome.description: Pharacokinetic evaluation in terms of Cmax
Pharacokinetic evaluation in terms of Tmax
Pharacokinetic evaluation in terms of T1/2
Pharacokinetic evaluation in terms of AUC

secondary_outcome.measure: The relationship between 2-hydroxyglutaric acid (2-HG) level and curative effect
secondary_outcome.description: biomarker evaluation in terms of 2-hydroxyglutaric acid (2-HG)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: effectiveness evaluation in terms of Objective Response Rate (ORR)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: effectiveness evaluation in terms of Overall Survival (OS)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 12 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: effectiveness evaluation in terms of Progression-Free Survival (PFS)

arm_group.description: KY100001; Tablet; Oral route; Dose escalation and dose extension

intervention.description: KY100001; Tablet; Oral route; Dose escalation and dose extension
